Merge pull request from meteor / update - babel - template
Camera has a new property : ` lerp ` . This is a Point object , that allows you to control the amount of horizontal and vertical smoothing to be applied to the camera when it tracks a Sprite . It works both with and without deadzones , and is turned off by default . Set it to low values such as 0 . 1 for really smooth motion tracking ( thanks to @ WombatTurkey for the idea of adding this )

docs ( jqLite ) : fix typo
The StateManager will now check if a State has a method called ` resize ` . If it does , and if the game is running in the RESIZE Scale Mode then this method will be passed two parameters : ` width ` and ` height ` that will match the games new dimensions . Resizing can happen as a result of either the parent container changing shape , or the browser window resizing .

Physics . Body . syncBounds is a new property that if true forces the Body to check itself against the Sprite scale instead , and adjust its dimensions against the Sprite scale instead , and adjust its width and height accordingly . If false it will compare its dimensions against the Sprite scale instead , and adjust its width and height accordingly . packager : @ flow : @ flow
Adding quarter formats
PIXI . BaseTexture . forceLoaded allows you to set a BaseTexture as loaded , with the given width and height . It then calls ` BaseTexture . dirty ` . This is important for when you don ' t want to modify the shape of the source object by forcing in ` complete ` or dimension properties it may not naturally have , but still wish to use it as a base texture .

If is a new boolean Game Config property called ` customEnvironment ` . If set to ` true ` it will skip the internal Feature checks when working out which type of renderer to create , allowing you to run Phaser under non - native web environments . It cannot be left as AUTO . Fix

Run Prettier
The Canvas ` SetTransform ` method would save the context state , but it wasn ' t restored at the end in the following Game Objects : Dynamic Bitmap Text , Graphics , Arc , Curve , Ellipse , grid , IsoTriangle , Star and Triangle . These now all restore the context , meaning if you ' re using non - canvas sized cameras in Canvas mode , it will now render beyond just the first custom camera .

Merge pull request from dann / dagoba
Loader . headers object has a new property ` requestedWith ` . By default this is set to ` false ` , but it can be used to set the ` X - Requested - With ` header to ` XMLHttpRequest ` ( or any other value you need ) . To enable this do ` this . load . headers . requestedWith = ' XMLHttpRequest ' ` before adding anything to the Loader .

Merge pull request from ichernev / bugfix / format - with - array
The ` setFrame ` method of the Texture component has been updated so that it will now automatically reset the ` width ` and ` height ` of a Game Object to match that of the new Frame . Related , it will also adjust the display origin values , because they are size based . If the Frame has a custom pivot instead .

Merge pull request from RocketChat / fix - channel - icon
Added Phaser . PENDING_ATLAS as the texture key for any sprite . Doing this then sets the key to be the ` frame ` argument ( the frame is set to zero ) . This allows you to create sprites using ` load . image ` during development , and then change them to use a Texture Atlas later in development by simply searching your code for ' PENDING_ATLAS ' and put it to be the key of the atlas data .
Merge pull request from RocketChat / fix - ts - build
Merge pull request from twbs / smartypants
Pull out bootstrap package into a separate repo
Add xhr parameter to API
The Game Object Bounds component has been updated so it now provides setters for all of the properties , as well as getters . Previously ` Sprite . left ` , ` Sprite . right ` , ` Sprite . bottom ` were read - only , but they are now available to be set as well , and take into consideration the anchor and scale of the Game Objects .

Phaser . TilemapParser . INSERT_NULL is a new boolean that controls what happens when the parser encounters an empty tile : if scanning the Tiled map data the TilemapParser can either insert a null value ( true ) or a ` Phaser . Tile ` data the ` tile : When scanning the Tiled map data the TilemapParser can either insert a null value ( true ) or a ` Phaser . Tile ` instance with an index of - 1 ( false , the default value set ( thanks ) then leave the default value set ( thanks )

Merge pull request from RocketChat / develop
Update index . html
ArcadePhysics . overlap has been updated so that the Body . overlapX / Y properties are set to the amount the two bodies overlapped by . Previously they were zero and only populated during the separation phase , but now the data is available for just overlap checks as well . You can then use these values in your ovrelap callback as required - note that they are changed for every check , so a Sprite overlap tested against 10 other sprites will have the overlapX / Y values updated 10 times in a single collision pass , so you can only safely use the values in the callback as required - note that they are changed for every

1 . 0 . 1
Theroying a Game object during its ` pointerup ` event handler on a touch device will no longer cause ` Uncaught TypeError : Cannot read property ' localX ' of undefined ` . All InputPlugin process handlers now check to see if the Game Object has been destroyed at any stage and abort if it has . Fix

If you flagged a Tween as ` paused ` in its config , never started it , and then called ` Tween . stop ` it wouldn ' t ever be removed from the ` _pending ` array . It ' s now moved to the Tween Manager ' s destroy list , ready for removal on the next frame . Fix
